title: 'The Art of Armed Robbery': Episode 22
description: Today, we are in Essex and East London.  A commuter is shot at a railway station when he attempts to foil an armed robbery.  The investigation leads to a high-profile crime author who had turned his back on a life of crime.  Were he and his brother guilty of a series of robberies culminating in the shooting?
